verbs.description: [ARG0: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] [V: retaliated] [ARGM-MNR: swiftly] [ARG1: against President Donald Trump ’s metals tariffs] [ARGM-MNR: by imposing his own levies on as much as C$ 16.6 billion ( $ 12.8 billion ) of U.S. imports in what Canada calls its strongest trade action since the Second World War] .

[ARG0: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] retaliated swiftly against President Donald Trump ’s metals tariffs by [V: imposing] [ARG1: his own levies] [ARG2: on as much as C$ 16.6 billion ( $ 12.8 billion ) of U.S. imports] [ARGM-LOC: in what Canada calls its strongest trade action since the Second World War] .

Prime Minister Justin Trudeau retaliated swiftly against President Donald Trump ’s metals tariffs by imposing his own levies on as much as C$ 16.6 billion ( $ 12.8 billion ) of U.S. imports in [ARG1: what] [ARG0: Canada] [V: calls] [ARG2: its strongest trade action since the Second World War] .
